args.natural_language_statement: Suppose f : ‚ÑÇ ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ is analytic and f'(z0) ‚â† 0. Show that f is a local diffeomorphism at z0 (that is, locally invertible with analytic inverse).

import Mathlib

open Complex

/-- Placeholder predicate: f is analytic (holomorphic) as a map Complex ‚Üí Complex. -/
constant IsAnalytic : (Complex ‚Üí Complex) ‚Üí Prop

/-- Placeholder predicate: g is holomorphic on a subset of Complex. -/
constant IsHolomorphicOn : Set Complex ‚Üí (Complex ‚Üí Complex) ‚Üí Prop

/-- If f : ‚ÑÇ ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ is analytic and injective, then f has a (two-sided) inverse on its image
    which is holomorphic on that image; in particular f is a conformal map onto its image. -/
theorem analytic_injective_implies_conformal (f : Complex ‚Üí Complex)
  (hf : IsAnalytic f) (h_inj : Function.Injective f) :
  ‚àÉ g : Complex ‚Üí Complex, (‚àÄ x : Complex, g (f x) = x) ‚àß IsHolomorphicOn (f '' (Set.univ : Set Complex)) g := by sorry

import Mathlib

/-- Placeholder predicate: f is analytic (holomorphic) as a map Complex ‚Üí Complex. -/
constant IsAnalytic : (Complex ‚Üí Complex) ‚Üí Prop

/-- Placeholder predicate: g is holomorphic on a subset of Complex. -/
constant IsHolomorphicOn : Set Complex ‚Üí (Complex ‚Üí Complex) ‚Üí Prop

/-- If f : ‚ÑÇ ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ is analytic and injective, then f has a two-sided inverse on its image
    which is holomorphic on that image; in particular f is a conformal map onto its image. -/
theorem analytic_injective_implies_conformal (f : Complex ‚Üí Complex)
  (hf : IsAnalytic f) (h_inj : Function.Injective f) :
  ‚àÉ g : Complex ‚Üí Complex, (‚àÄ x : Complex, g (f x) = x) ‚àß IsHolomorphicOn (Set.range f) g := by sorry

import Mathlib

/-!
Suppose f : ‚ÑÇ ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ is analytic and f'(z0) ‚â† 0. Show that f is a local diffeomorphism at z0
(that is, locally invertible with analytic inverse).
-/

theorem complex_local_diffeomorphism {f : ‚ÑÇ ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ} {z0 : ‚ÑÇ}
  (hf : AnalyticAt ‚ÑÇ f z0) (hder : deriv f z0 ‚â† 0) :
  ‚àÉ (U V : Set ‚ÑÇ) (g : ‚ÑÇ ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ),
    IsOpen U ‚àß IsOpen V ‚àß z0 ‚àà U ‚àß f z0 ‚àà V ‚àß
    (f '' U ‚äÜ V) ‚àß
    (‚àÄ x ‚àà U, g (f x) = x) ‚àß
    (‚àÄ y ‚àà V, f (g y) = y) ‚àß
    AnalyticAt ‚ÑÇ g (f z0) := by sorry

import Mathlib

constant IsAnalytic : (Complex ‚Üí Complex) ‚Üí Prop
constant IsHolomorphicOn : Set Complex ‚Üí (Complex ‚Üí Complex) ‚Üí Prop

theorem analytic_injective_implies_conformal (f : Complex ‚Üí Complex)
  (hf : IsAnalytic f) (h_inj : Function.Injective f) :
  ‚àÉ g : Complex ‚Üí Complex, (‚àÄ x : Complex, g (f x) = x) ‚àß IsHolomorphicOn (Set.range f) g := by sorry

import Mathlib

open Complex

axiom IsAnalytic (f : Complex ‚Üí Complex) : Prop
axiom IsHolomorphicOn (s : Set Complex) (g : Complex ‚Üí Complex) : Prop

theorem analytic_injective_implies_conformal (f : Complex ‚Üí Complex)
  (hf : IsAnalytic f) (h_inj : Function.Injective f) :
  ‚àÉ g : Complex ‚Üí Complex, (‚àÄ x : Complex, g (f x) = x) ‚àß IsHolomorphicOn (Set.range f) g := by sorry

args.natural_language_statement: Let f be entire and suppose f(z) ‚â† 0 for all z. Show that there exists a holomorphic g with f = e^g.

retrieved_examples.nl: If f is entire and nonvanishing, then there exists an entire g such that f = exp ‚àò g.
retrieved_examples.lean:
import Mathlib

open Complex

theorem exists_log_of_nonvanishing_entire {f : Complex ‚Üí Complex} (hf_entire : IsEntire f) (hf_ne_zero : ‚àÄ z, f z ‚â† 0) : ‚àÉ g : Complex ‚Üí Complex, IsEntire g ‚àß (‚àÄ z, f z = Complex.exp (g z)) := by sorry

import Mathlib

open Complex

/--
Let f be entire and suppose f(z) ‚â† 0 for all z. Show that there exists a holomorphic g with f = e^g.
-/
theorem exists_log_of_nonvanishing_entire {f : Complex ‚Üí Complex} (hf_entire : IsEntire f) (hf_ne_zero : ‚àÄ z, f z ‚â† 0) :
  ‚àÉ g : Complex ‚Üí Complex, IsEntire g ‚àß (‚àÄ z, f z = Complex.exp (g z)) := by sorry

import Mathlib

open Complex

/--
Let f be entire and suppose f(z) ‚â† 0 for all z. Show that there exists a holomorphic g with f = e^g.
-/
theorem exists_log_of_nonvanishing_entire {f : Complex ‚Üí Complex} (hf_diff : Differentiable Complex f) (hf_ne_zero : ‚àÄ z, f z ‚â† 0) :
  ‚àÉ g : Complex ‚Üí Complex, Differentiable Complex g ‚àß (‚àÄ z, f z = Complex.exp (g z)) := by sorry
